backend
Interface PieceFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsorberFactory, BallFactory, CubicalBumperFactory, FlipperFactory, SphericalBumperFactory, TriangularBumperAFactory
public interface PieceFactory

PieceFactory - creates a piece for the gizmoball game.

Method Summary
 Piece makePiece(javax.vecmath.Point3d location)
          Creates a default piece.

          Creates a custom piece.
 

Method Detail

makePiece

public Piece makePiece(javax.vecmath.Point3d location)
Creates a default piece.

Returns:
a Piece at the given location.

makePiece

public Piece makePiece(javax.vecmath.Point3d location,
                       double radius,
                       double xLength,
                       double yLength,
                       double zLength,
                       double mass,
                       javax.media.j3d.Transform3D velocity,
                       double COR,
                       javax.media.j3d.Appearance app,
                       boolean isVisible)
Creates a custom piece.

Parameters:
location - - location of the piece's bounding box's lower-left corner
radius - - radius of the piece
xLength - - x-dimension of the piece
yLength - - y-dimension of the piece
zLength - - z-dimension of the piece
mass - - mass of the piece
velocity - - velocity of the piece
COR - - coefficient of reflection of the piece
app - - appearance of the piece
isVisible - - whether this piece is visible or not
Returns:
a Piece from the given parameters.
